001package _XXX;
002
003import ij.IJ;
004import ij.plugin.PlugIn;
005import imagingbook.lib.ij.GenericDialogPlus;
006
007public class GenericDialogPlus_Example implements PlugIn {
008        
009        enum MyEnum {
010                Alpha, Beta, Gamma;
011        }
012
013        @Override
014        public void run(String arg) {
015                
016                GenericDialogPlus gd = new GenericDialogPlus("Testing enums");
017                gd.addEnumChoice("Choose from here", MyEnum.Beta);
018                gd.showDialog();
019                if (gd.wasCanceled())
020                        return;
021                MyEnum m = gd.getNextEnumChoice(MyEnum.class);
022                IJ.log("Your choice was " + m);
023        }
024
025}
